short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get instant Premier League stats in your new tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install "PremierLeague Stats" extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the services in terms of use https://softwe.art/Terms/ and privacy policy https://softwe.art/Privacy-Policy/
